ConfigItem.Desc: Enables the preamplifier when set. This bit only has an effect when the Audio plugin is used. CVC audio plugins automatically adjust the input gain of the device.
Sets the gain of the analogue input path.

This configuration item specifies the ADC Input audio bit resolution. Note: This configuration item is only relevant for analogue audio input and this is only applicable where the hardware supports it.
Enables the preamplifier when set. This bit only has an effect when the Audio plugin is used. CVC audio plugins automatically adjust the input gain of the device.
Sets the gain of the Microphone input path.
Selects the digital microphone inputs when set.
This configuration item selects the audio channel A or B.

ConfigItem.Desc: The fast charge current is increased until Vchg drops to this limiting threshold.
If Vchg drops to the limiting threshold then the fast charge current is decreased until Vchg recovers to this higher threshold.
The period between reading Vchg when determining the charger current.
The step size for increasing the charger current.
The step size for decreasing the charger current.

ConfigItem.Desc: The Vref input can be configured to use any of the available input sources given below.
This configures the time interval between Vref updates in seconds while charging, 0 to disable.
This configures the timer interval between Vref updates in seconds while not charging, 0 to disable.
Internal constant current source to drive the thermistor
Delay(ms) between driving thermistor and reading ADC
Set limits in ADC counts rather than voltage
